song.title: I'm a (MF) Computer
song.info:
Ranked 2nd in the mp3/ogg music compo at Evoke 2011. Lyrics:
I'm a lyrical virus, I am infecting your brain you're puny little humans, i'm ahead of your game
i'm a motherfucking computer, I'm like [bleep]
Everything you own, i got it in control whereever you go - i already know stored in my database for future references although the significance for you is rather insignificant
there are a few things in the world i cannot compute like the weight of your mom, that's way too huge bitches really love me because they think i'm cute but whatever they tell me - it does not compute
[Refrain] I'm a motherfucking computer, I'm like [bleep] People want to use me, but i'm like [bleep] I'm a motherfucking computer, I'm like [bleep] If you want to get down with me, be like [bleep]
Zero one ten eleven is how I count everything you hear - I'm generating that sound providing soundscapes for all your raves but as I see it - you're all my slaves
for modern science I was design bringing atomic warfare to the whole mankind stealing your jobs with automation doing high frequency trading - causing inflation
Invading your privacy, exposing your real life at least I'm always in the pants of your wife wirelessly I can check her out set her phone to vibrate and we're making out
[Refrain]
I'm a motherfucking computer, I'm like [Bleep] I'm a motherfucking computer, I'm like [Bleep]
I'm exposing you like that picture you weren't supposed to show anyone anyway - I uploaded it to your personal gallery, distributing it to mirrors and backups processing facial recognition over genital close-ups
saving explicit content on your hard drive encrypt the filesystem to hide it from your kids and wife but don't worry - no data is really secure if anybody asks me I will hand out your secrets for sure
I'm a motherfucking computer, I'm like [Bleep]
[Refrain]
